value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: How to create an Azure SQL database | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create an Azure SQL Database in the Azure Portal and how you can be more productive in Azure.    Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com   Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: Ingest, prepare & transform using Azure Databricks & Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Today's business managers depend heavily on reliable data integration systems that run complex ETL/ELT workflows (extract, transform/load and load/transform data). Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can iteratively build, debug, deploy, and monitor your data integration workflows

value.title: How to get started with Azure API Management | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with Azure API Management, a service that helps protect and manage your APIs. value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer
value.excerpt: This learning path guides data engineers through the evolving benefits your organization gains with Azure cloud data platform technologies.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Discover how data systems and roles are evolving and explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions using sample business cases.

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Explore the broad array of Azure technologies that analyze text or images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data.

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer, how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI roles, and explore common data engineering practices.

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

value.title: Choose the best Azure service to automate your business processes
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll discuss how to choose the appropriate Azure service to integrate and automate business processes.

value.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification
value.excerpt: Use machine learning models to categorize data. Build a logistic regression model and support vector machine models to predict categories like win/loss and tree species.
